  1. Foster Name: Georgia Jane
  2. Foster Family: George and Mabel Langer
  3. Location of Family: Seward, NE
  4. Sending Organization: Children's Aid Society
  5. Arrival Place: Unknown
  6. Age on Arrival: 4
  7. Date of Birth: 1918-03-14
  8. Date of Death: 1934-01-27
  9. Gender: female
  10. Notes: Died of illness at age of 14 years old. See obituary in Seward Independent Democrat 1934-02-01
  11. Source: Seward Independent Democrat, 1 February 1934; Tecumseh Chieftain, 15 October 2015.
